description:
The investment seeks to track the investment results (before fees and expenses) of the Dynamic Oil Services IntellidexSM Index.
 The fund generally will invest at least 90% of its total assets in common stocks of companies that assist in the production, processing and distribution of oil and gas that comprise the underlying intellidex. The underlying intellidex was composed of common stocks of 30 U.S. companies that assist in the production, processing and distribution of oil and gas. The fund is non-diversified.
